Package rucafe

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
rucafe.MenuItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Coffee, Donut
public abstract class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract MenuItem class that enforces itemPrice for Coffee and Donut objects.
Author:
Toshanraju Vysyaraju, Christopher Nguyen
